00046 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 #define CLASS_DESC_OFFSET                   (18)
00048 
00049 #define CLASS_REQ_01_GET_RPOT               (u16)(0x1 << 8)
00050 #define CLASS_REQ_02_GET_IDLE               (u16)(0x2 << 8)
00051 #define CLASS_REQ_03_GET_PTCO               (u16)(0x3 << 8)
00052 #define CLASS_REQ_09_SET_RPOT               (u16)(0x9 << 8)
00053 #define CLASS_REQ_0A_SET_IDLE               (u16)(0xA << 8)
00054 #define CLASS_REQ_0B_SET_PTCO               (u16)(0xB << 8)
00055 
00056 #define HID_RPOT_TYPE_01_INPUT              (0x01)
00057 #define HID_RPOT_TYPE_02_OUTPUT             (0x02)
00058 #define HID_RPOT_TYPE_03_FEATURE            (0x03)
00059

00088 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00089 /* USB HID Report Descriptor                                                                                */
00090 __ALIGN4 static uc8 USB_HID_ReportDesc[] = {
00091     0x06, 0x00, 0xff,              // USAGE_PAGE (Vendor Defined Page 1)
00092     0x09, 0x01,                    // USAGE (Vendor Usage 1)
00093     0xa1, 0x01,                    // COLLECTION (Application)
00094 
00095     0x09, 0x02,                    //   USAGE (Vendor Usage 2)
00096     0x15, 0x00,                    //   LOGICAL_MINIMUM (0)
00097     0x26, 0xff, 0x00,              //   LOGICAL_MAXIMUM (255)
00098     0x75, 0x08,                    //   REPORT_SIZE (8)
00099     0x95, 0x40,                    //   REPORT_COUNT (64)
00100     0x81, 0x02,                    //   INPUT (Data, Var, Abs)
00101 
00102     0x09, 0x03,                    //   USAGE (Vendor Usage 3)
00103     0x15, 0x00,                    //   LOGICAL_MINIMUM (0)
00104     0x26, 0xff, 0x00,              //   LOGICAL_MAXIMUM (255)
00105     0x75, 0x08,                    //   REPORT_SIZE (8)
00106     0x95, 0x40,                    //   REPORT_COUNT (64)
00107     0x91, 0x02,                    //   OUTPUT (Data, Var, Abs)
00108 
00109     0x09, 0x04,                    //   USAGE (Vendor Usage 4)
00110     0x15, 0x00,                    //   LOGICAL_MINIMUM (0)
00111     0x26, 0xff, 0x00,              //   LOGICAL_MAXIMUM (255)
00112     0x75, 0x08,                    //   REPORT_SIZE (8)
00113     0x95, 0x40,                    //   REPORT_COUNT (64)
00114     0xb1, 0x02,                    //   FEATURE (Data, Var, Abs)
00115 
00116     0xc0                           // END_COLLECTION
00117 };
00118 
00119 __ALIGN4 static u8 gInputReportBuffer[64];
00120 __ALIGN4 static u8 gOutputReportBuffer[64];
00121 __ALIGN4 static u8 gFeatureReportBuffer[64];
00122 static vu32 gIsSetOutputReport = 0;
00123 static vu32 gOutputReportLen = 0;
00124 static vu32 gEP2Len = 0;
00125 
00126 static vu32 gIsEP2OUTReady = FALSE;
00127 static vu32 gIsEP1INEmpty = TRUE;
00128 static u32 gIsReadyToLoopBack = FALSE;
00129 
00130 /* Global Function -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00131 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00132   * @brief  USB Class initialization.
00133   * @param  pClass: pointer of USBDCore_Class_TypeDef
00134   * @retval None
00135   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00136 void USBDClass_Init(USBDCore_Class_TypeDef *pClass)
00137 {
00138   pClass->CallBack_MainRoutine.func = USBDClass_MainRoutine;
00139   //pClass->CallBack_MainRoutine.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00140 
00141   pClass->CallBack_Reset.func = USBDClass_Reset;
00142   //pClass->CallBack_Reset.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00143 
00144   //pClass->CallBack_StartOfFrame.func = USBDClass_StartOfFrame;
00145   //pClass->CallBack_StartOfFrame.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00146 
00147   pClass->CallBack_ClassGetDescriptor = USBDClass_Standard_GetDescriptor;
00148   //pClass->CallBack_ClassSetInterface = USBDClass_Standard_SetInterface;
00149   //pClass->CallBack_ClassGetInterface = USBDClass_Standard_GetInterface;
00150 
00151   pClass->CallBack_ClassRequest = USBDClass_Request;
00152   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[1] = USBDClass_Endpoint1;
00153   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[2] = USBDClass_Endpoint2;
00154   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[3] = USBDClass_Endpoint3;
00155   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[4] = USBDClass_Endpoint4;
00156   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[5] = USBDClass_Endpoint5;
00157   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[6] = USBDClass_Endpoint6;
00158   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[7] = USBDClass_Endpoint7;
00159 
00160   #ifdef RETARGET_IS_USB
00161   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[RETARGET_RX_EPT] = SERIAL_USBDClass_RXHandler;
00162   #endif
00163 
00164   return;
00165 }
00166 
00167 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00168 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00169   * @brief  USB Class main routine.
00170   * @param  uPara: Parameter for Class main routine
00171   * @retval None
00172   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00173 static void USBDClass_MainRoutine(u32 uPara)
00174 {
00175   USBDClass_ReportProcess();
00176   USBDClass_EPT1INProcess();
00177   USBDClass_EPT2OUTProcess();
00178 
00179   return;
00180 }
00181 
00182 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00183   * @brief  USB Class Report Process for application.
00184   * @retval None
00185   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00186 static void USBDClass_ReportProcess(void)
00187 {
00188   s32 i;
00189   if (gIsSetOutputReport == TRUE)
00190   {
00191     for (i = gOutputReportLen - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00192     {
00193       gInputReportBuffer[i] = gOutputReportBuffer[i];
00194     }
00195     gIsSetOutputReport = FALSE;
00196   }
00197 
00198   return;
00199 }
00200 
00201 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00202   * @brief  USB Class Endpoint 1 IN Process for application.
00203   * @retval None
00204   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00205 static void USBDClass_EPT1INProcess(void)
00206 {
00207   s32 i;
00208   u32 len;
00209   if (gIsReadyToLoopBack == TRUE)
00210   {
00211     if (gIsEP1INEmpty == TRUE)
00212     {
00213       gIsEP1INEmpty = gIsReadyToLoopBack = FALSE;
00214       for (i = gEP2Len - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00215       {
00216         gInputReportBuffer[i] = gOutputReportBuffer[i];
00217       }
00218       len = USBDCore_EPTGetBufferLen(USBD_EPT1);
00219       USBDCore_EPTWriteINData(USBD_EPT1, (u32 *)gInputReportBuffer, len);
00220     }
00221   }
00222 
00223   return;
00224 }
00225 
00226 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00227   * @brief  USB Class Endpoint 2 OUT Process for application.
00228   * @retval None
00229   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00230 static void USBDClass_EPT2OUTProcess(void)
00231 {
00232   if (gIsEP2OUTReady == TRUE)
00233   {
00234     gEP2Len = USBDCore_EPTReadOUTData(USBD_EPT2, (u32 *)gOutputReportBuffer, 64);
00235 
00236     __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld EP2OUT\t[%02d]\r\n", ++__DBG_USBCount, (int)gEP2Len);
00237     __DBG_USBDump((uc8 *)gOutputReportBuffer, gEP2Len);
00238 
00239     gIsEP2OUTReady = FALSE;
00240     gIsReadyToLoopBack = TRUE;
00241   }
00242 
00243   return;
00244 }
00245 
00246 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00247   * @brief  USB Class Reset.
00248   * @param  uPara: Parameter for Class Reset.
00249   * @retval None
00250   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00251 
00252 static void USBDClass_Reset(u32 uPara)
00253 {
00254   static u32 isFirstReset = TRUE;
00255   /* Just for once.                                                                                         */
00256   if(isFirstReset)
00257   {
00258     /*
00259       1. HSI Trimming is enabled.
00260       2. Enable Auto Trimming Controller.
00261       3. Auto Trimming Manual by usb's SOF.
00262     */
00263     u32 uTemp = HT_CKCU->HSICR;
00264     isFirstReset = FALSE;
00265     uTemp &= 0xFFFFFFEF;
00266     uTemp |= 0x23;
00267     HT_CKCU->HSICR = uTemp;
00268   }
00269 }

00285 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00286   * @brief  USB Device Class Request
00287   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00288   * @retval None
00289   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00290 static void USBDClass_Request(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00291 {
00292   u16 uUSBCmd = *((u16 *)(&(pDev->Request)));
00293 
00294 #ifdef RETARGET_IS_USB
00295   SERIAL_USBDClass_Request(pDev);
00296 #endif
00297 
00298   switch (uUSBCmd)
00299   {
00300     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00301     /* | bRequest             | Data transfer direction | Type                | Recipient   | Data          */
00302     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00303 
00304     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00305     /* | 01_Get Report        | 80_Device-to-Host       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 01A1h         */
00306     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00307     case (CLASS_REQ_01_GET_RPOT | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00308     {
00309       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET RPOT\t[%02d][%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pDev->Request.wValueH, pDev->Request.wLength );
00310       USBDClass_GetReport(pDev);
00311       break;
00312     }
00313     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00314     /* | 02_Get Idle          | 80_Device-to-Host       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 02A1h         */
00315     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00316     case (CLASS_REQ_02_GET_IDLE | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00317     {
00318       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET IDLE\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00319       USBDClass_GetIdle(pDev);
00320       break;
00321     }
00322     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00323     /* | 03_Get Protocol      | 80_Device-to-Host       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 03A1h         */
00324     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00325     case (CLASS_REQ_03_GET_PTCO | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00326     {
00327       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET PTCO\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00328       USBDClass_GetProtocol(pDev);
00329       break;
00330     }
00331     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00332     /* | 09_Set Report        | 00_Host-to-Device       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 0921h         */
00333     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00334     case (CLASS_REQ_09_SET_RPOT | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00335     {
00336       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET RPOT\t[%02d][%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pDev->Request.wValueH, pDev->Request.wLength);
00337       USBDClass_SetReport(pDev);
00338       break;
00339     }
00340     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00341     /* | 0A_Set Idle          | 00_Host-to-Device       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 0A21h         */
00342     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00343     case (CLASS_REQ_0A_SET_IDLE | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00344     {
00345       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET IDLE\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00346       USBDClass_SetIdle(pDev);
00347       break;
00348     }
00349     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00350     /* | 0B_Set Protocol      | 00_Host-to-Device       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 0B21h         */
00351     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00352     case (CLASS_REQ_0B_SET_PTCO | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00353     {
00354       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET PTCO\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00355       USBDClass_SetProtocol(pDev);
00356       break;
00357     }
00358   }
00359 
00360   return;
00361 }
00362 
00363 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00364   * @brief  USB Device Class Standard Request - GET_DESCRIPTOR
00365   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00366   * @retval None
00367   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00368 static void USBDClass_Standard_GetDescriptor(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00369 {
00370   u32 type = pDev->Request.wValueH;
00371 
00372   switch (type)
00373   {
00374     case DESC_TYPE_21_HID:
00375     {
00376       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)((pDev->Desc.pConfnDesc) + CLASS_DESC_OFFSET);
00377       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = DESC_LEN_HID;
00378       pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00379       break;
00380     }
00381     case DESC_TYPE_22_RPOT:
00382     {
00383       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)(USB_HID_ReportDesc);
00384       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = DESC_LEN_RPOT;
00385       pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00386       break;
00387     }
00388     case DESC_TYPE_23_PHY:
00389     {
00390       break;
00391     }
00392   } /* switch (type)                                                                                        */
00393 
00394   return;
00395 }

00423 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00424   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - GET_REPORT
00425   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00426   * @retval None
00427   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00428 static void USBDClass_GetReport(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00429 {
00430   u32 value = pDev->Request.wValueH;
00431   u32 len = pDev->Request.wLength;
00432 
00433   switch (value)
00434   {
00435     case HID_RPOT_TYPE_01_INPUT:
00436     {
00437       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(gInputReportBuffer);
00438       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = len;
00439       pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00440       break;
00441     }
00442     case HID_RPOT_TYPE_03_FEATURE:
00443     {
00444       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(gFeatureReportBuffer);
00445       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = len;
00446       pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00447       break;
00448     }
00449   }
00450 
00451   return;
00452 }
00453 
00454 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00455   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - GET_IDLE
00456   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00457   * @retval None
00458   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00459 static void USBDClass_GetIdle(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00460 {
00461   /* Add your own GET_IDLE function here....
00462      For example....
00463 
00464   u32 uReportID  = pDev->Request.wValueL;
00465   u32 uInterface = pDev->Request.wIndex;
00466 
00467   pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(__IDLE_DURATION_BUFFER[uReportID]);
00468   pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = 1;
00469   pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00470 
00471   */
00472   return;
00473 }
00474

00495 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00496   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - SET_REPORT
00497   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00498   * @retval None
00499   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00500 static void USBDClass_SetReport(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00501 {
00502   u32 value = pDev->Request.wValueH;
00503   u32 len = pDev->Request.wLength;
00504   switch (value)
00505   {
00506     case HID_RPOT_TYPE_02_OUTPUT:
00507     {
00508       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(gOutputReportBuffer);
00509       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = len;
00510       pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAOUT;
00511       pDev->Transfer.CallBack_OUT.func = USBDClass_SetReportCallBack;
00512       pDev->Transfer.CallBack_OUT.uPara = len;
00513       break;
00514     }
00515     case HID_RPOT_TYPE_03_FEATURE:
00516     {
00517       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(gFeatureReportBuffer);
00518       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = len;
00519       pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAOUT;
00520       break;
00521     }
00522   }
00523 
00524   return;
00525 }
00526

00532 static void USBDClass_SetIdle(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00533 {
00534   /* Add your own SET_IDLE function here....
00535      For example....
00536 
00537   u32 uReportID     = pDev->Request.wValueL;
00538   u32 uIdleDuration = pDev->Request.wValueH;
00539   u32 uInterface    = pDev->Request.wIndex;
00540 
00541   __IDLE_DURATION_BUFFER[uReportID] = uIdleDuration;
00542 
00543   */
00544   return;
00545 }

00555      For example....
00556

00563   return;

00566 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00567   * @brief  USB Device SET_REPORT call Back function
00568   * @param  uPara: Parameter for SET_REPORT call back function (SET_REPORT wLength)
00569   * @retval None
00570   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00571 static void USBDClass_SetReportCallBack(u32 uPara)
00572 {
00573   gIsSetOutputReport = TRUE;
00574   gOutputReportLen = uPara;
00575 
00576   return;
00577 }
00578 
00579 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00580   * @brief  USB Class Endpoint handler
00581   * @param  EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00582   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT7
00583   * @retval None
00584   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00585 static void USBDClass_Endpoint1(USBD_EPTn_Enum EPTn)
00586 {
00587   gIsEP1INEmpty = TRUE;
00588 
00589   __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld EP1IN\t[%02d]\r\n", ++__DBG_USBCount, (int)USBDCore_EPTGetBufferLen(EPTn));
00590   __DBG_USBDump((uc8 *)gInputReportBuffer, USBDCore_EPTGetBufferLen(EPTn));
00591 
00592   return;
00593 }
00594

00600   ***********************************************************************************************************/
